name: Nanashi Reload
description:
A platform shooter made for the Boss Rush Game Jam.

Controls

It supports keyboard and gamepad as input (xbox controller, dualshock and maybe some others)

MoveArrow keys
JumpZShootXAimCDashV or shift

Special moves:

AirdashJump + DashCrouchDown arrow key
SlideCrouch + DashFall fast(Air) Down arrow key + Dash

That's it. Feel free to give feedback, leave a comment or share your thoughts. Also, if you ended up enjoying the game, consider rating it or making a donation. That helps a lot. Thanks for the support!

Have fun!
